metadata.title: A Turtle By Any Other Name

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone! And welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First and foremost, our returning sponsor of campaign two: our friends at D&D Beyond. Sam.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know what's great about D&D Beyond, guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Other times they get a glimpse into history, and that's what we're going to do today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sometimes they get a shark costume.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the past, I've presented things that I've found about You've Got Gale, starring our own Ashley Johnson, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You were so good at it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So tonight with D&D Beyond's support, we will present a radio play of sorts of the trailer for the spin-off movie for the show You've Got Gale, that had definitely existed in the 80s.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How did you find this? I just, it's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe some music, Matt, if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (movie trailer VO voice) This summer, a new hero will rise.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Save the orphans! I'm going to take out their headquarters!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (gruff voice) No! It's a suicide mission! They have missile launchers!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I eat missile launchers for brunch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (Russian accent) You shot all of my men! How did you find me?! Who are you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My god, what did you do to me last night?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thanks, but I don't think that cigarette--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it! I'm the President of the United States of America, and I'm ordering you to stand down!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why don't you gag me with a spoon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ashley Johnson is Gale, in Gale Force Five, a Gale in Your Coffin, gagging spoons in theaters everywhere this Memorial Day.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh man, just like when you were younger!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, it took a while to get back into it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a shame that never made it--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was completely shot on Betamaxes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: When I was a kid in the 80's, Terminator 2 and Gale Force Five informed my whole childhood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We appreciate you, please subscribe, if you haven't already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We had a little half an hour closing party, you can see on our YouTube channel, where we all got super emotional and proceeded to down shot after shot of "totally alcohol," but yeah--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think the statute of limitations has passed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're super excited and it's been fun for a lot of us to go back and start listening and rewatching the old campaign episodes and reliving those moments.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to make a cartoon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, do you have a merch update?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You might have noticed on Twitter today that we announced our Grog Strongjaw mugs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, and this is the box it comes in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We haven't shown this off yet, and we're really excited about the box, so I'm going to, hold on, hold on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got, "How Do You Want to Do This?" If you drink, it's got Critical Role written on the bottom so everyone sees it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then, another thing you can buy is this! That you could add to it, if you want to be Grog-y about it, or Yasha-y about it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah! I would like to rage!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I want eight of them for my dining room table.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She does custom bags and so she did my Vex one, which is really full, and now I can fill up a second Jester one, and on the inside, she did like, a thing where it's got Jester doodles on the inside of the bag, like there's Tusktooth! It's just amazing, and I haven't had a chance to put dice in it yet, because it just came in, but.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to wipe the slate clean and start all over with new dice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up, shut up, shut up, no! Thank you, Christina, I really appreciate that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering) [water bubbling] [explosion] ♪ Role, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Role, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Role, Critical Role ♪ ♪ Roll, Critical, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Roll, Critical, roll the dice ♪ ♪ The adventure begins ♪ ♪ They were always beside you ♪ ♪ Your nerdy best friends ♪ ♪ The DM to guide you ♪ ♪ They rise from the flames ♪ ♪ For the battles ahead ♪ ♪ Villains beware 'cause you're 'bout to be dead ♪ ♪ They got magic and flare ♪ ♪ They got falchions and cunning ♪ ♪ They don't see over there ♪ ♪ There's a monster incoming ♪ ♪ Inspiration is waiting ♪ ♪ Rise up don't think twice ♪ ♪ Put your fate in your hands ♪ ♪ Take a chance ♪ ♪ Roll the dice ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Role, Critical, roll the dice ♪ ♪ Can you answer the call ♪ ♪ Diggin' deep in your soul ♪ ♪ As the legend unfolds ♪ ♪ Now it's your turn ♪ ♪ To roll ♪ (fire crackling)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Upon inspecting the body, you watch this strange glowing, jellyfish-like entity, just drift ethereally out of the wall and then lower itself into the body of the dead giant, in which the dead giant began to reanimate, its jaw tearing open into a terrible grin, the flesh on the sides of its face, tearing up to where near its ears are before it begins to rouse and that's where we left off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did I recognize the jellyfish entity, does it seem like something I would know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure of the essence or nature of it, but you're watching a dead body now come to animate itself after coming into contact and absorbing this entity.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The one behind the pit, right? The one in the room we're in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Going back to the Grog die.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are starting off with combat that is powered by Dwarven Forge. They currently have a free 406 page PDF module tied to their Dungeons of Doom products, available now on their website, Dwarven Forge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to do great! I'm fine!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, don't even recognize you anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be seven for me, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's arms, (cracking), and it begins to shudder and stand with this horrible series of sounds as its body seems to be folding and breaking its way, back to its position, but it's your turn, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to grab my symbol of the Traveler, and I'm going to say: I hope you're down here with us right now, because I could really use your help! I'm going to try to Turn Undead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can do it to an undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 15, what's the DC?

lines.text: No. Look at all that covered shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: "For its action, it can only use the dash action, "or try to escape from an effect "that prevents it from moving."

lines.name: SAM

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It can't come within 30 feet of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to move, or are you going to stay put?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move, is that other creature still here? That other thing isn't still here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Currently, the only thing that you know that's moving in the vicinity is the giant.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'm going to move over and try to hide a little bit behind, yeah, right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not--I'm going to stand next to it, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I also, oh god, it's Turn Undead, so if we hit the giant, then the Turn Undead ends, right? Yeah, okay, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (reading) "If the creature fails its saving throw, "it is turned for one minute or until it takes any damage," so don't hit it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn, Jester. Caduceus.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: get a little bit of distance, I'm going to head towards our giant, our non-undead giant friend over here and while I pass Fjord, I'm going to tap him and cast Death Ward.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, Fjord. You have Death Ward on you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which means that when you drop to zero hit points, you immediately pop back up to one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going full movement, or are you staying there? You have ten more movement.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to hide in that corner if possible, yeah, get a little behind.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think that Caleb knows what's going on, because he's over here, looking out, so I'm just going to ready a Fire Bolt for anything that appears, and if something appears that looks dangerous, I'm going to blast it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fire Bolt for anything dangerous coming.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You can go. I don't know where I am.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I saw Jester do her cool thing, so I'm going to bolt ahead towards the direction of Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You going to hold your action, or?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yasha's here, right by Marisha's board.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know why she got put over there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was over there. Oh, because it happened right there.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm in the general vicinity, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to bonus action dash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Move behind the stalactite and try and peek and then can I--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to Patient Defense, can I do that, no?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then my move, bonus action, sorry, Patient Defense.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then ki point to Patient Defense?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. So you go into defensive state.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then can I see anything in the dark?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You used your action and other things, so you're not-- make a general perception check, I'll say with disadvantage, because you didn't take an action to try and see specifically the vicinity around you in the dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight? In the essence of running over there, getting behind it, and preparing yourself to defend, you've only just started glancing over there so you can't make out too much detail, so the next round more of it will become available to you, but this round, your eyes are still focusing from the transition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your turn. Yasha, what you got?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to cast Healing Hands, which restores you for nine hit points, but I don't know if you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take it! Yeah! That's great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's something. So I'll do that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: As I'm walking by and then I will finish my move to go out into the hallway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It surges through him and helps mend him of his wounds. You rush past, turn the corner, pass your giant friend, Soorna, and turn around to see both Caleb and Beau preparing for whatever is beyond that hallway in the darkness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes your go. Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use my 30 feet of movement to head towards the hallway as well?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thanks, Yasha, and I will cast Armor of Agathys on myself, at 5th-level, which will give me 25 temporary hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've seen undead turned, you've seen them, the look of fear in their eyes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For whatever reason, it seems like it would be undead, but it's not turned.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half of its movement to stand up, it still has 20 more feet of movement.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it sees you, Nott, it's going to take a swing at you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, let me see? Oh, I don't have line of sight, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a good call on that one, so you take half--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fuck, because I don't have fucking visual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Got to keep everybody in my line of sight.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We should've threw him in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many, how many, how many?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you have uncanny dodge, the total is 34.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Weren't you going to double that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and it's going to leap across the bone pit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take a swipe at it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I take a swipe at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can. It does leave your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nine points of damage! From a shortsword!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whooshing) This flash, slight shimmer of whatever light is coming through the cavern reflects off the blade as, for the first time in a while, you've seen Nott use a non-crossbow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be 26 to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I guess that hits me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keeps clattering to the other side of the map.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's thrown to the ground, knocked prone, but you get back up just barely--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I scream at it-- oh, I don't know if this is going to work, but oh well, because it's undead, but whatever, I've already said it, I'm going to say: I thought jellyfishes were supposed to be so pretty! (awwing) Then I'm going to do--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the save on that, dexterity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now have all these different piercing thorns and spears of ice sticking into its torso, and it seems to grin back at you with its horrible torn, crooked smile.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes its turn. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First, I will undo my nine points of damage because I already used uncanny dodge as my reaction.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you did swing, and it hit nothing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will attack it now with my crossbow, because it's engaged with good ol' Jessie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That definitely hits. You can roll damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Jester, you're up on deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no, Soorna's up on next, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Three plus another, nine points of damage! That's the nine that I undid!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll move into that corner and hug the wall, yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Soorna, watching this corpse rise up, eyes wide in horror, goes, "I'm sorry friend."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, to him, not to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So full damage on that attack there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The bones crack on the inside, where they impact on the chin, it breaks open a bit and the jaw's hanging to one side, and the tongue is trying to reach down and grab the jaw to pull it back into place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Soorna, after throwing the rocks, she looks down towards you and she goes, "Be careful, follow," and begins to step back into this portion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it Jessie, come on!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to use Command, but I don't think that the jellyfish speaks English, so, I'm going to use Inflict Wounds at 3rd-level with my Pearl of Power, and I'm going to grab ahold of his ankle, and say: I hope this hurts! And cast Inflict Wounds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, that was 3rd-level! Okay, wait, hold on, how many points is that? 5d10! I just don't, oh come on, motherfucker.

lines.text: What do you want, for, Inflict Wounds, you're doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inflict Wounds, I believe, is 3d10 damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If I move away, he's going to get a swipe out of it, but I'm going to try it. I'm going to run away from him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, where are you running?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't want to be in this room alone with this guy! Are you here still?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, never mind, I'm going to stay--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to step back towards the well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to stay within his range and yeah, go right there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What am I doing? What am I doing? You don't know, you don't know!

lines.text: I pull out a bit of brimstone, tallow, and powdered iron and goo it into a tiny little super ball and spin it into a rasengan giant ball of fire that grows to about five feet wide and with a bit of the English, I spin a Flaming Sphere on a curve, along this way, and hit, level three.

lines.text: It curves around, (thudding) arcs over, and dexterity saving throw I believe, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Meh. Nine, so four or five?

lines.text: Correct, and you are now concentrating to keep that up. Did you have one previously?

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The little bit you can see down here, there's another hallway that also seems to carry another stone bed and that's about as far as you can see at a quick glance, so.

lines.text: Are they beds or are they tombs?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn around to Caleb, who I think is behind me, and I go: There-- Then I start making my way back.

lines.text: You can bonus action Step of the Wind, if you want.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Which I think it will get me to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll the dice, add the amount of fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be a 3d6, plus whatever your.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I've got my next three turns planned, so I'm fine.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's the bonus again, I'm sorry?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, so and then, divine fury.

lines.text: Oh yeah, so divine fury is part of your first strike?

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.text: It's part of the first strike.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (yelling)

lines.name: ASHLEY

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I actually didn't add enough that last round, but that's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It didn't matter, you killed it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does it look like it was hurt?

lines.text: Does it have little eye stalks in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now I believe that finishes your turn, though, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, it does. I'll stay there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see the jellyfish pop out of the carcass that Yasha just carved? I'll send two swaths of Eldritch Blast at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one you (groaning) and it hits the wall next to you, spraying you with--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For my movement, I will go up and join Beau, I'm pretty sure they can handle whatever's going on in that room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it. That finishes your turn.

lines.name: MATT

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next to it, this strange little purple doorway opens up and it jumps into and closes and it vanishes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I get an attack of opportunity?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait! If it Dimension Doored, that means it's going somewhere else within 500 feet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a moment, the ball of fire's crackling there, everyone's, (panting).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to just-- I'm just keeping my eyes bloody open.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think there's sarcophagus, over here.

lines.text: It can--I mean, bones don't--it would take a while--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's fine, I'm going to set whatever I can on fire because I'm a fire bug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I'm going to go watch him--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Since nothing seems to be happening, I'm going to turn my way, and like look around the corner, I'm going to cast Daylight right at the entrance of this fucking, light this room up right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, yeah. You open up another chamber with a series of stone beds that are--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see another chamber with a pool of water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a wide staircase that ascends--

lines.name: MARISHA

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, go to it and jump off.

lines.text: You are sending the flaming sphere down, it jumps, (crackling) it begins to burn through--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll damage for the flaming sphere.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It might be those weird cockroach things.

lines.name: LIAM

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as a tiny, filthy, scared, filth-covered goblin that appeared to have been living inside this bone pit, is trying to scramble out before it incinerates and burns to death.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As soon as I see it, I drop the spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's smoldering amongst the rest of the bones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No fucking way! It can't happen twice!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it dead, dead, we can't revive it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, we can't talk to it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Was that a real sheet tear?

lines.text: Just in case you come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch Yasha sit down and lay against the side of the mountain.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, under some leaves to try to keep dry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the next flash of light, you see the clouds part into two pale, glowing eyes open before you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It says, "You are still shackled, child."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know what that means.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Don't let the iron be your strength."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do I fight against it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I look down and I try to start pulling it apart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull and you pull and you can hear the squeaking of iron tensing (squeaking).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I start screaming and pulling as much as I can.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And Nott and Caleb and Zuala and I keep pulling and screaming.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is where we're going to-- (screaming) (thudding)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get to deal with whatever your lesson may have been taken from that experience, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man, oh man! That was crazy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm excited to see where the next stage goes, you guys.
